description: (Enterprise Tier Only) Commands to handle instances of a managed component.

commands.name: az spring component instance list
commands.summary: (Enterprise Tier Only) List all available instances of a specific managed component in an Azure Spring Apps instance.
examples: az spring component instance list --component spring-cloud-gateway --service MyAzureSpringAppsInstance --resource-group MyResourceGroup
az spring component instance list --component spring-cloud-gateway-operator --service MyAzureSpringAppsInstance --resource-group MyResourceGroup
